title: Interpretation of a dream about martyrdom in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, the Encyclopedia presents an interpretation of seeing a dream about martyrdom in a dream, which is one of the pillars of Islam and the first condition for entering it, and it is also the last thing that should happen in its language. A servant before death, which is in the form of I bear witness that there is no god but God and I bear witness that Muhammad is the Messenger of God. Through what has been narrated by dream interpretation scholars, we present various indications of seeing an unmarried woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman pronouncing the Shahada in a dream, as well as the situation in which the dreamer was dying Whether or not. The Shahada said the Shahada. Interpretation of the dream of martyrdom in a dream. According to what was narrated by the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of the Shahada in a dream and repeating the Shahada or conjuring it in a dream, we convey the following interpretations: The Shahada in a dream symbolizes blessings in life, livelihood and knowledge. The Shahada foretells the dreamer if he is almost indebted. With forgiveness and payment of his debt. The two Shahadas in a sinner’s dream serve as a warning and a reminder of the necessity of repentance and abandoning the path of sin and disobedience. Seeing the deceased in a dream saying the Shahada symbolizes his great status and God’s satisfaction with him. Saying the Shahada in a dream brings good news and happiness to the seeker of knowledge because it indicates Distinction and graduation. Pronunciation of the certificate in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi says in a dream the following interpretations about seeing the two certificates in a dream: The two certificates in the dream symbolize the return of the absent person from the trip. Reading the certificate in a dream is a permissible ruling, a response to a supplication, and repentance accepted by God. Saying the certificate in a dream indicates Reconciliation between two quarrels, as well as the return of the spouses after separation. Al-Osaimi says: If one of them is sick and sees that he is saying the Shahada, this is the opposite of what some people believe is an evil omen, but rather indicates recovery by God’s command. Reading the Shahada in an unmarried woman’s dreamIn the following points, we present the interpretation of the Shahada In a dream for a single woman that she recites the two Shahadas in one dream: Reciting the two Shahadas in a dream indicates secrecy, happiness, and the introduction of a righteous man to her. The unmarried woman recited the Shahada loudly in the dream, and there was someone repeating it around her from behind her. The dream showed her closeness to God Almighty and her role in spreading Religious teachings. For someone to indoctrinate someone to torture in a dream means success in the next period of his life from a scientific and social point of view. Speaking a testimony in a dream to a married woman. Seeing a married woman saying testimony in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, and these are the connotations of her vision: And the fact that a married woman Saying the Shahada in a dream indicates that God Almighty will bless her with pregnancy with good offspring. Seeing a married woman saying the Shahada in a dream foretells that she will accept the request and fulfill the desires she wants for herself and her family. Seeing death and pronouncing the Shahada easily symbolizes a married woman’s long life in the pleasure of God Almighty. Pronouncing the Shahada in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman pronouncing the Shahada in a dream can cause fear and anxiety for her life and her fetus during childbirth. Therefore, we present in the following paragraph the interpretation of the vision of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a young child according to Ibn Sirin’s relatives

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a young child from a relative is a common dream for many people, and this dream is considered an intense and disturbing fear for children. Therefore, the leading interpreters were interested in clarifying the interpretations of this dream. VariousIn this article, the interpretation of a dream about the death of a small child from a relative in a dream, according to the opinion of the leading interpreters of single, married, pregnant, and male people. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a small child from a relative. Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of the dream about the death of a small relative In a dream, it indicates the presence of a large number of problems in the dreamer’s life, and these problems may be related to this child’s family. The dream also expresses that the dreamer is making many decisions that negatively affect his life. One of the positive interpretations of the death of a young child in a dream is that this dream is an indication However, the dreamer has been freed from all the sins he committed, and this is a sign of returning to the path of God Almighty and avoiding sins. And heresies. If someone sees in a dream a dead child from his relatives and this child is already wrapped, then this vision indicates the beginning of a new life full of gifts after a difficult time. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a young child from a relative for single peopleThe death of a young child at the hands of relatives of an unmarried girl in The dream indicates her inability to help save this child, and this is an expression of her negligence in kinship ties. If an unmarried girl sees a dead child from her relatives, this indicates that she will soon marry a good young man who wants to achieve her happiness and fulfill all her requests. If an unmarried girl sees A dead child of her relatives, but she seemed happy, and that girl is looking for a job, this is a sign that the search journey has ended and she will get a suitable job opportunity in a prestigious center. When an unmarried girl sees the death of her relative’s young child in a very difficult situation, this is evidence that this girl She suffers from some diseases and the emergence of many problems and disasters in her life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a child of a young relative of a married woman. One of the dreams that interpreters have dealt with with interpretation and detail is the dream of the death of one of the child’s young relatives in a dream of a married woman, The interpretations of this dream vary. The death of a small child at the hands of the relatives of a married woman with whom she had enmity may be a sign of her victory and victory over them. The dream of the death of a small child at the hands of the relatives of a married woman may indicate that she fears for her children from being harmed and this fear is amplified. If she sees A married woman sees a small child of her relatives crying to death, this is not a good dream at all, because it represents the loss of many valuable things, and if the child’s screams are heard, this is an expression of the death of one of her relatives. The death of a small child was caused by relatives, and this child was an infant It indicates relief from the distress that a married woman is experiencing and the beginning of a new life characterized by stability. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a young relative’s child for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman sees in her dream the death of a young child of her relative before her eyes and her due date is approaching, and this vision expresses

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of intense crying in a dream. Dreams are a group of fantasies that occur to a person during sleep and are characterized by many unexpected events in sleep. This also gives a number of positive motivations in a person’s life and is far from negative in him, but there are some dreams that carry unpleasant titles for a person. And frightening in general, and this is what drives a person to search for the basic explanation for this phenomenon that occurs during sleep, so a number of people searched for the interpretation of a dream about crying seriously in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about screaming loudly from the darknessThe process of interpreting dreams is done by identifying the set of fantasies that he experiences. The person during sleep works to determine the foundations and interpretations assigned to it by those interested in this science. A specialist to reach the primary goal of the dream that the person feels. In general, the dream of crying loudly from injustice in a dream can also be interpreted, according to what the specialists have done, as follows: A single girl’s dream of crying loudly in her dream is a sign of the fulfillment of a difficult desire. In her life. Seeing a pregnant woman crying loudly in her dream is a harbinger of an easy birth. A man’s dream when he sees in a dream that he is crying a lot is a sign that he will receive halal money. Crying loudly in a dream for a married woman indicates the end of her marital problems and the stability of her life. Interpretation of a dream of intense crying for a pregnant woman. Dreams can be the vision that heralds a person the coming of goodness and halal food. This is due to the correct interpretation process and positive analysis in it. The person must also turn to experts in the science of interpretation in order to find the correct quality in the interpretation process and achieve success. General examinations and basic procedures therein. As for the explanation for a pregnant woman crying loudly during sleep, it is: It may be a sign that the pain and fatigue are about to subside. The interpretation of the dream could be a harbinger of easy-going and easy-going children. Crying during sleep may not have any other explanation other than fear From birth for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about someone screaming loudly. From a health point of view, dreams benefit a person by renewing mental activity and logical thinking that a person experiences in his life, and during sleep in a person: This cry can indicate intense joy, pleasure, and comfort. Of the anxiety that a person experiences in his daily life. However, if a person sees that he is crying in a dream, this indicates that the person will fall into the throes of death or perhaps a calamity, and there is no cry, then this indicates great joy in the person’s life. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying. Dreams are The important source of anxiety and suffering that a person experiences in his life, and this is what brings about resurrection with constant fear and anxiety in it, and this also contributes to linking the events that a person goes through in general, and the interpretation of a dream about crying loudly for the dead indicates a group of events that a person goes through In life and the interpretation of the dream is: The interpretation of the dream of a deceased person crying in a dream indicates a lot of disappointment

title: Interpretation of the color of gold in a dream: seeing wearing gold in a dream

preview.html: The golden color is one of the most beautiful colors, as we explain to you the dream of the golden color of the estate for married people, for pregnant women, and for divorced women: that I wear a golden dress, gold shoes, and gold. Golden clothes or shirt by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and more explanations in the continuation of the topic. Interpretation of the color of gold in a dream. The golden color in a dream shows great luck and a great share and shows the turn of events according to the interests of the individual. Seeing the golden color in a dream indicates that a person will get rid of the anxiety and burdens that he carries on his shoulders. His shoulder, and hearing wonderful news, the person’s days will be filled with happy relationships and he will get what he wants in this period, and he can solve his problems easily. The golden object that the person saw is also important in the interpretation of the vision. Seeing decorative things in gold indicates money, ownership, and increasing wealth. Seeing golden clothes indicates that a person will achieve his goals early, before the time he has set for achieving them. Seeing a golden rosary in a dream means security and wealth for the heart, while seeing golden hair in a dream indicates intellectual culture, new interviews, and successful projects. It indicates a person's calm and serenity in the face of negative situations. The golden color in a dream or dream symbolizes spiritual rewards, reinforcements, and wealth in your environment. The golden color also symbolizes your perseverance and perseverance. Seeing the golden color in a dream often indicates wealth and improvement in the circumstances surrounding a person, and it can reflect Seeing this color represents a person's gratitude to others and his determination to achieve the things he desires. If the golden color in the dream is embodied in leaves, it may reflect human hope for a prosperous and happy future. If the color of gold in a dream appears on coins such as gold pounds, it symbolizes the way one deals with One is with success and wealth, and this of course depends on the context of the dream. The golden color in the dream symbolizes spiritual rewards, reinforcements, and wealth in the environment in which the person lives. If the dust in the dream is golden and gets stuck between the dreamer’s fingers, this is evidence of ending or changing one of the personal relationships, because The dreamer will feel that he has made a grave mistake. If the dreamer finds that he entered it in a dream and tried to hide it, this indicates his attempt to mislead what is happening, and if he dreams that he found an amount of gold, this means that he discovered something important in himself. Interpretation of the color of gold in a dreamThe color of gold in a dream It has many aspects of interpretation and is one of the colors that carries very positive meanings, especially for women. Interpretation of golden clothes in a dream: What a person wears in a dream is evidence of his livelihood and gains, and the colors of clothes and fabrics describe in a dream the psychological state of the beholder. For example, light colors express happiness and optimism, and dark colors express a state of depression, stagnation, and sadness... As for bright or metallic colors, such as gold and silver, in dreams, they express optimism, ambition, and achieving the highest levels of goals. The golden color in a woman’s clothing often indicates owning something that has benefit. Material or living, so

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black crow in a dream: seeing a crow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a crow in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, if I see a crow attacking me, chasing me, a black crow flying by Ibn Sirin by Imam Al-Sadiq and more. Interpretation of a dream about a crow. The meaning of a crow in a dream carries many interpretations that vary depending on the situation of the viewer. Different interpretations according to The social status of the viewer. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the crow in a dream as a corrupt and corrupt person. Whoever sees in his dream a crow flying far away shows that there is something occupying the mind of the dreamer and its outcome will be good, God willing. Whoever sees a crow flying in this direction indicates the many worries and problems facing the person who has the vision, and if a crow is found on a tree branch, it is evidence of the presence of a acting friend, and the voice of the crow. The crow is evidence of bad news. But if he sees that he is talking to a godfather, this is evidence of the child’s support, or even of the disabled boy. Seeing a crow in a dream, as Ibn Sirin says, is evidence of worry and sadness, but relief will come later, God willing, and the crow is evidence of separation from loved ones, travel, and estrangement. As for seeing yourself eating crow meat, this is evidence that you are getting money from thieves. Transforming into a crow in a dream is evidence that you will obtain prohibited money, pleasure and happiness. Seeing a spotted crow is evidence of longevity. As for seeing a crow falling from the Kaaba, this is evidence that he is an immoral man, but he will marry a good and generous woman. Seeing a crow entering the house is evidence of money and honor at the end of life. Seeing a crow is a symbol of secrets on earth and may indicate the burial of the dead. Seeing a crow planting is evidence that the dreamer is mixed between good and evil. And seeing a crow in a dream standing in the house, then his status is a corrupt man. Seeing a crow standing somewhere is evidence of the death of a stranger from the city in that place. Seeing a crow chasing the person with the vision is evidence of bad luck, and a crow attack is evidence of a quarrel between him and another person who discovered his betrayal. It also indicates injury, damage, and the occurrence of disturbing events. And death and illness. As for seeing a crow biting in a dream, it is evidence of the fear and tension that the dreamer is experiencing, and it can indicate poverty, hypocrisy, hypocrisy, lying, perjury, and spreading false news. Seeing a dead crow in a dream is evidence of the departure of kindness, good luck in the future, healing of the sick, and reconciliation. Between quarreling spouses, it also indicates the disappearance of pain and troubles, whether for livelihood or work, and it may indicate the death of a sorcerer, the anti-Christ, or a hypocrite. Seeing a black crow for a pregnant woman is evidence of the presence of a newborn male and may indicate a delay in childbirth or difficulty in childbirth. Also, seeing a black crow flying is evidence of travel and may indicate the discovery of conspiracies, good luck, and a vision that gives the dreamer optimism. Seeing a black crow in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of bad luck and may indicate the presence of a hypocritical person you know who does not marry her, but if she is engaged, this Evidence of breaking off this engagement. Seeing an aso crow

title: Interpretation of a dream about a broken shoe in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: The dream also indicates the bad things that she will see in her life and through our interpreter website, we will show you the interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream.Interpretation of seeing cut shoes in a dream for one girlIf the unmarried woman who dreams sees that she is buying new shoes, and discovers that they are cut in the dream. It indicates that a good man will propose to her and later learn of some mistakes in his life. And if a woman sees in a dream that she was wearing broken shoes in a dream, and her appearance was bad. It indicates that there are great adversities that this unmarried woman will experience with her life and it will not end easily. And a single girl saw in a dream that the cut-off shoes were beautiful, and she was sad. A sign that something that was recently started will end and many problems will arise from it. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the cut-off shoes were badly shaped. It indicates that she will face something bad in Her life, and it will make her very sad. See also: Interpretation of a dream about old shoes for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing broken shoes in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is looking at pieces of shoes in a dream, this is a bad thing. An indication that there are many sad things that she will see and live in these The married woman. And a married woman saw that her husband gave her the cut-off shoes in a dream to wear. A clear explanation is that during this period she will fall into some bad problems in her life. Or the married dreamer who looked at the cut-off shoes in a dream, and cried loudly. Here is a clear explanation that during this During this period, he will encounter some marital problems. And seeing a married woman whose child was giving her his own shoes in a dream. The meaning indicates that there is a problem that this child and this married woman will encounter in her life. Interpretation of seeing torn shoes in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that her shoes are torn, then she looks bad in her life. The dream about her wearing it. The meaning shows that there are many difficult things that she will experience in her life now. Or the divorced woman whose ex-husband used her to remove her torn shoes and replace them with new shoes. This is a clear indication that she will return to her ex-husband, God willing, in the near future. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream She does not have an uncut shoe. Here it explains that she will get into a big problem in her life and she will not get rid of it quickly. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that her shoe has been cut off and she walks with it in the dream. The meaning is interpreted that she will suffer from some problems and crises in her life. Interpretation of seeing cut shoes In a dream about a man and its meaning, if the dreamer sees that his shoes are torn and in bad condition. This is an indication that he will suffer a lot from some problems in his life during this period. And if the dreamer sees that his shoes are torn, he gets married on the way. This indicates that he will live a period full of marital strife and it will not end quickly. Likewise, seeing the dreamer in a dream looking at his damaged and torn shoes is an indication that there are many problems that he will face in this period of his life, and God is All-Knowing. And knowing the dreamer in a dream that he is buying

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about riding a horse from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a horse being ridden in a dream: Seeing a horse is considered one of the visions that carries many interpretations and symbols, and this vision has many connotations that vary based on many considerations, including that a person may see himself riding a horse, and this horse may be black, white, or brown, and it can To be hasty or meek, and what concerns us in this article, we will consider all cases and the special meaning of a dream about riding. Learn the interpretation of a dream about riding a horse from Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about riding a horse The interpretation of a dream about riding a horse symbolizes unusual changes in a person’s life, and permanent transitions from one state to another , and the changes that occur in his personality and correspond to it. This vision also denotes glory, prestige and honor, removing difficulties and obstacles from the path, ending distress and anguish, and feeling comfortable about the desired goals. If the dreamer sees that he is riding a horse, this means that he has fulfilled many desires and ambitions, He made impressive and noticeable progress on Earth, and met many needs. On the other hand, this vision expresses the tendency towards leadership, achieving mastery, the desire to gain status and prestige among people, and to engage in many life battles and adventures from which experience and knowledge are gained. And in the event that a person sees He is riding a horse and then falls from it, this means being removed from the center, a great loss, the inability to manage things, and the inability to achieve complete control. And whoever sees that he is riding a horse and running quickly, this expresses great readiness and preparedness for any emergency that may happen or entering into the battle of life. A new dream that takes up the dreamer’s time and life. In short, seeing a horse being ridden is a sign of controlling the course of the matter and enjoying great privileges that allow its owner to expand his influence and control. Interpretation of a dream about riding Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a horse riding is an expression of honor, glory, prosperity, kingship and power. It also expresses This vision is about fulfilling many desires, hard work and perseverance, achieving a great rank, reaching the desired position and a person working hard to earn it. If someone sees that he is riding a horse, this means marriage in the near future, entering into a new adventure and changing circumstances quickly. Whoever aspires to seize Authority, this vision indicates the enjoyment of ruling powers, reputation and fame, and gaining great benefit. This vision also indicates dominance, leadership, love of chivalry, guardianship, achievement, and the ability to overcome all obstacles that prevent a person from achieving his goals and desires. But if the dreamer sees that he is riding a horse and sees that he Flying with him, it symbolizes high status and status, abundant livelihood and blessings, high profit, professional ethics, and a good reputation among people. The same previous vision also indicates a person who achieves a balance between his religion and his world and is able to win people’s love without effort or desire to do so. But if the dreamer sees horses racing quickly, this is a harbinger of a boring season

title: Interpretation of a dream that you do not find anyone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream that I do not find a person in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of the dream that I do not find a person in a dream. It is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are a number of interpretations that the site explains, citing the interpretations of some hard-working scholars who are seeking to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream that you do not find Someone in a dream: A dream of not finding someone in a dream may indicate opponents that the dreamer may encounter in his life during this period. In the case of his personal opinion that he found someone else in the dream, this may indicate some problems and fears that this person may face He must seek God's help. Seeing someone finding someone else in a dream may indicate positive changes that may occur in one's life at that time. In case someone sees that he has found someone else in a dream, it may be a sign of losing someone. Members of his family or something valuable to him during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding a water well in a dream: Seeing finding a water well in a dream may indicate the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this time. Finding a water well may indicate The dream indicates the abundance of money that the dreamer may gain in his life during those days. In the event that you see finding a water well in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of the sins and disobedience that the dreamer committed during his life during this period. If in a dream you see finding a water well, This may indicate some happy events that may happen to the dreamer in his life during those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding a gun in a dream: It is possible that the vision of finding a gun in a dream indicates the security that the dreamer may feel in those days, and God knows best. If One sees that he takes a gun in a dream, this may indicate that he is a rational person who weighs things. If you see a gun in a dream, it may mean paying off debts and getting rid of financial crises that the dreamer was facing in his life. Dreaming of finding a gun in a dream may indicate wisdom And the strength of mind that the dreamer enjoys thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about finding a missing shoe in a dream. If you see a missing shoe present in a dream, this may indicate the strength of opinion that the dreamer has in his life. Seeing that a missing shoe is found in a dream may indicate a long period that may The dreamer is suffering from it and that he will be freed from it by the grace of God. If you see a missing shoe in a dream and find it, this may indicate that dreams and aspirations have been largely fulfilled during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he found a shoe that he was losing, it may indicate that he will face some problems From which he will be freed in the coming days, by the grace of God. Interpretation of a dream about finding sunglasses in a dream: Whoever finds sunglasses in a dream may indicate the happiness that the dreamer may enjoy in his life, and God knows best. Dreaming about finding sunglasses in a dream may indicate protecting children from any A problem they face outside the home. If one sees himself finding sunglasses in a dream, he may...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a coffin by Ibn Sirin: If a person sees in a dream that he is inside a coffin and people are walking in it, then this is evidence of the wonderful position that he will obtain at work and that he will be famous and worthy of it. Seeing a person in a coffin in a dream indicates a high position that he will gain among people and he will receive respect and appreciation from People around him. If someone sees in a dream that he is making a coffin himself, this means that all the decisions he makes in his life are correct. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is in a coffin and people are walking to her funeral, this indicates that she She performs many corrupt acts and is the source of corruption in the place she is in. If a married woman is pregnant and sees that she is in a coffin, this indicates the difficulty of childbirth and the safety of the fetus. If a married woman sees in a dream a large number of coffins in one place, this is evidence of the spread of immorality and sins. In that place. If she dreams that she is carrying the coffin herself, this indicates that her husband will have debts and will get into trouble. If a married woman sees an iron coffin in a dream, this is evidence that her husband will get into trouble and a major crisis that may lead to his imprisonment. If a woman sees If a married woman sees a golden coffin, this indicates a male child. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream for a single woman. If a single girl sees him being inside the coffin, this indicates that he will get married soon. If a girl sees in a dream a coffin flying in the air, this indicates the death of a person in exile. If you see A coffin in a girl’s dream, this indicates marriage to a man of high status and wealth. If a girl sees a coffin made of gold, this indicates that she is engaged to someone she loves. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream about a man. See the man inside. The dream carrying the coffin of a friend or acquaintance indicates that he He profits from forbidden money. If a man sees in a dream that he is in a coffin, this is a sign of money and pride that the dreamer will be in it. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is in a coffin, this indicates an easy birth, if people talk about it Well during the funeral procession. If a pregnant woman sees that she is in a coffin and people go to her funeral laughing, this indicates stumbling. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin and a shroud. If you see a coffin journey in a dream, this is evidence of the imminent term and the death of a person of good morals and religion. If you see a coffin made of diamonds in a dream, This is evidence of many sins and disobedience committed by the dreamer. If the coffin is seen falling from people in a dream, it is a loss of money and a loss in business. A shroud in a dream indicates the many diseases that the dreamer suffers from, and seeing it in a shroud is nothing but sins and disobedience that he commits in reality and follows His desires. Wearing a shroud in a dream is a sign of immorality and immorality in the dream of an unmarried girl, as seeing a shroud indicates delaying marriage and thinking strongly about it. Seeing a dirty shroud in a married woman’s dream is evidence of major problems with the husband, and a white shroud is a praiseworthy vision and indicates...

preview.html: The dreamer who sees that he is looking for eggplant in a dream is a sign of the presence of a financial crisis in his life, so join us to find out the interpretation of seeing eggplant together in a dream on the Mufassir website. Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream, she is looking at eggplant In a dream, and it was off-season in the dream. It indicates that she will see some problems and things that exhaust her in the afterlife, which also make her sad. As for seeing a girl in a dream, she sees eggplant in a dream, and she wants to eat it in the dream. Explaining that she She is trying to earn a living, but she will face major problems during this period, and God knows best. An unmarried girl seeing in a dream that she was looking at an eggplant in a dream, but she could not take it home. This shows that she will see many good things in her life, and she will try to possess them in the coming periods. And God knows best. If an unmarried girl looks at eggplant and wants to eat it in a dream, but she cannot in the dream and is sad. This is a clear indication of the difficulties that she will see in her life until she makes a living in the coming seasons. See also: Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream. And its meaning by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman saw in a dream that she was looking at eggplant in a dream, and she was very happy in the dream. It is interpreted that she will see a lot of goodness in her life, and that she will live a comfortable life, God Almighty willing. And seeing a married woman in a dream That there are a lot of eggplants that are not ripe in a dream. It indicates that she will face problems until she finds an important topic to move on to the next period of her life, and God knows best. And seeing a married woman in a dream, that a stranger was giving her eggplants in the dream, and she was happy. This is an indication. However, she got rid of the major problems in her life during this time, and God is the Most High. And if a married woman sees eggplant in a dream and is happy to see it and buys a lot of it in the dream, she declares that she will obtain goodness and livelihood in her life and in the coming periods and will live happily, God willing. Interpretation of the vision Eggplant in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman saw in a dream that she was looking at an eggplant and wanted to eat it, but she could not. It explains that she will see in her life a lot of goodness and food, but after some fatigue and misery, and God knows best. And the divorced woman who looked at the eggplant in a dream, and there was a lot In her house, and ate from it. She announces that she will marry a good man in the coming period and live in a house that she wanted in her life. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream is that she sees eggplant, and at another time in the dream, she is surprised by its presence. This indicates that she will face some financial crises in the future. Her life during this time and that she will be very sad. Seeing the divorced woman in the dream eating a lot of eggplant, and she was very hungry in the dream and longed for it. This is evidence that this divorced woman will be freed from all the problems she is going through in her life, and God is Most High.
